attributes.action: speak about when to enforce the un global commission on drugs policy report
attributes.additional_details: extremely vile violation of human rights and people have rights to choose witch drug they relax with so tell me how is smoking weed,heroin or crack or sniffing a line of coke going to effect someone else if in a controlled environment  and regulated by government that make a consistent product like any other company why leave in the hands of people that don't care whats in the drugs and just want money http://www.globalcommissionondrugs.org/wp-content/uploads/2016/11/GCDP-Report-2016-ENGLISH.pdf
attributes.background: drugs were only made illegal originaly so that governments could profit from them as when you take a drug coffee,alcohol or a heroin based pain killer or any other pharmaceutical drugs it only effects the person that takes them so i conclude it is an extreme violation of people's human rights

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to implement the recommendations of the report of the UN's Global Commission on Drugs Policy.
